steps.title: Inform Customer of Rollback
steps.script_text: Ms. Miller, it looks like there's a known issue with the new firmware. To fix this, I need to roll it back to the previous version. This will take about 5-10 minutes and your internet will be briefly disconnected. Is that okay with you?

steps.title: Confirm Resolution with Customer
steps.script_text: Okay, the old firmware is active again and the line is stable now. Everything should be back to normal. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
